x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: User Modify and Delete reservations of other users. End users can able to modify and delete reservations for other users who are part of the same reservation owner in case where reservation class is "Private". They can able to do this through the Reservation History option and then navigating to the "Upcoming" option.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: User Modify and Delete reservations
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: This issue is in Norway and there is no hotfix for it. It is fixed in the Qatar version. We suggest you upgrade your instance to Qatar so that this issue might be resolved.
